suppliers.description: We sincerely bring you an opportunity to collaborate with customer <customerName/>. Tikataz is committed to providing you with high-quality business opportunities and a transparent process.

aboutme.title: Tikataz - Your trusted partner
aboutme.description: We connect over <supplierCount/> suppliers with <customerCount/> potential customers every month. This is a great opportunity for you to expand your business network and find new partners.

items.price_required: You have not entered enough prices for the list of items to quote, if you do not want to quote for an item, please click the skip button first.
items.no_items: There are no items in the quote list. If this quote does not suit you, please feel free to skip it or send us your feedback.

auths.m1: Connecting businesses with intelligent partnership solutions

branches.mess01: How does deleting a branch affect your process?
branches.mess02: The selected branches will be deleted. This will update your capability profile.
branches.mess03: The system will ignore geographic location suggestions for these branches. Previously matched orders outside the new scope will no longer be displayed.
branches.mess04: Any new branches you add will be reviewed and evaluated by us before beginning order matching.
branches.mess05: Update information about your business's expanded branches
branches.mess07: ‚úî Connect and find suitable partners through the addresses you provide
branches.mess09: ‚úî The system will score the information you provide, increasing recommendations to potential customers
branches.mess11: Added branches will be reviewed by us before being approved as part of your business profile.

conpany.content_02: This is information customers can use to contact you
conpany.content_03: Your company address enhances credibility and connects you with nearby customers
conpany.content_04: Supplementary information to give customers more perspective about you
conpany.mess01: Update basic information about your business
conpany.mess03: Basic information helps identify your business and is what we use to contact you. Includes business name, tax code, address, contact methods, etc.
conpany.mess04: This information will be displayed on your card by default. You can customize visibility settings for viewers through the settings menu.
conpany.mess06: ‚úî Connect and find suitable partners through the addresses you provide
conpany.mess08: ‚úî The system will score the information you provide, increasing recommendations to potential customers
conpany.mess10: We review the information you provide before approving it as part of your business profile. If not approved due to policy violations or evaluation criteria, you'll receive a system notification.

manager.m2: This dialog displays detailed information about leadership team members.
manager.m3: Member information will be updated in the business profile, publicly visible by default to potential partners from Tikataz.
manager.m4: You can adjust access permissions in this section's settings folder.
manager.m14: ‚úî The system will score the information you provide, increasing recommendations to potential customers
manager.m15: We review before approving it as part of your business profile.
manager.m16: How does deleting a member affect your process?
manager.m17: Deleted members will no longer appear on your business profile. Member information will be stored for 30 days and can be restored after deletion.
manager.m18: Although information will be deleted, impacts on your business credibility created by the member will still be stored for evaluation purposes.
manager.m19: New members you add will be reviewed before updating your business profile.

basic.timezone: Select language and timezone format for your page
basic.m1: What settings can you adjust here?
basic.m2: Basic settings focus on adjusting system control functions and user interface display.
basic.m3: This makes your operations more intuitive and ensures maximum convenience when using the website.

notify.m1: How do notification settings help you?
notify.m2: Our system will automatically send notifications to your provided contact information in your profile or tag. We'll send notifications for listed tasks when necessary.
notify.m3: This helps you receive updates as quickly as possible. However, you can configure which notifications to receive below.
notify.m4: This excludes urgent tasks like account verification notices, service term changes, privacy policy updates, information changes, etc.

privacy.m1: How do privacy settings help you?
privacy.m2: ‚úî Helps manage access and information sharing for your profile
privacy.m3: ‚úî Protects your personal information and informs us how you manage your information
privacy.m4: ‚úî Sensitive information like email, phone numbers, and addresses will be tightly protected and not shared without your consent
privacy.m5: Restricting information access may prevent misuse but could affect connections with potential partners. We encourage careful consideration of privacy changes while supporting connections with the most suitable partners.

feedback.m1: We review your feedback within 3 business days and respond via your provided email if needed.
feedback.m2: For urgent matters, please call our hotline at <first>0333 462 905</first> for prompt assistance.
feedback.m3: We reject inappropriate, offensive, or policy-violating feedback outside our <first>policy</first> scope.
feedback.m4: Your feedback will remain private unless required by authorities.
feedback.m5: View more Tikataz policies and terms <first>here</first>.

edit.header: Enter your customer information in the fields below
edit.m1: Information displayed on your card enhances credibility and trust with potential partners.
edit.m2: For verification needs, we'll conduct more specific checks.

gen.m2: Address information helps determine your location for connecting you with nearby potential customers.
gen.m3: You can provide one or multiple specific addresses or your operational scope.
gen.bzzcontent: * To help match your card with suitable customers, please provide more information about your business field.
gen.m4: Enter keywords for search engines to identify you, separated by semicolons. Example: steel; construction; furniture
gen.m6:
* We'll use your provided contact information when quotes or confirmations are needed:

1. Phone: For calls or messages

2. Email: For sending quotes



* Note: If not provided, we'll use your profile information. Please complete your profile.
gen.m7: * Basic information demonstrates your business's market presence and enhances card credibility.
gen.timemess:
* Work hours reference for sending quotes/orders. Default is 8 AM to 5 PM Monday-Saturday.



* Note: Adjusting Monday's time applies to other weekdays except Sunday/holidays.



Uncheck 'Active' for non-working days.



National holidays aren't counted as work days.

category.mess02: Categories include criteria beyond basic data, focusing on advanced capabilities your business can offer while enhancing card visibility.
category.mess03: This helps partners understand your suitability for recommendations.
category.mess04: - Please provide accurate details by selecting relevant categories and filling required fields.

cert.m02: Deleted certificates cannot be recovered. To add new certificates,
cert.m04: Select or search for the correct certificate type.
cert.m05: Then complete required certificate information below.
cert.m06: If your certificate type isn't found, select 'Undefined' and complete remaining fields normally.
cert.m08: * If required certificate icons aren't available:
cert.m10: Request development of specialized certificates for your products.
cert.m12: Beyond product formats, you can add awards/images demonstrating product credibility.
cert.m14: * We'll use your certificates to determine if you meet customer requirements for better recommendations.
cert.m16: Certificates must be official documents demonstrating reliability from valid organizations.
cert.m17: This excludes awards, badges, or other honors.
cert.m18: - For other cases, please contact us for support.
cert.m20: * Select representative product images to help partners recognize your products/capabilities. Requirements:
cert.nocert: <first>(No certificates yet)<second></second> Add certificates to enhance your brand's transparency and credibility.</first>

product.name: Enter product name:
product.m2: (Manufacturers with main products, factories, and need commercial partners)
product.m3: (Processors with factories that handle external product processing)
product.m4: (Service providers offering intangible value solutions like consulting, training, repairs, etc.)
product.m5: (Traders without manufacturing facilities, focused on finding customers/products from manufacturers)

mes.A0002: This section updates general quote information including name, address, and start/end times.
mes.A0003: - Start time cannot be before current time (default is current time).
mes.A0004: - End time cannot be before start time.
mes.B0007: Please fully describe products for earliest connections with suitable suppliers.
mes.B0008: You can also select from product history below for requotes.
mes.B0009: should also be provided to help us and your customers find you.
mes.B0012: Enter supplier codes below (maximum 3 suppliers per product).
mes.B0015: Each quote includes one PDF file (max 1MB).
mes.C0018: When creating quotes, we automatically suggest suitable suppliers.
mes.C0019: You can add additional filters below.
mes.D0002: Below are your pending or incomplete quotes.
mes.D0004: View all quotes and STOP/RESTORE them in Quote History above.
mes.F0002: We store quotes for 30 days after completion/cancellation. <first>Upgrade your account</first> for longer storage.

transp.timemexpl: (Average time from order receipt to successful delivery)

sightseeing.title: Headquarters/Factory Tours
sightseeing.explain: (Allowing tours lets customers evaluate your production environment and work culture)

thirdParty.title: Third Parties
thirdParty.explain: (When enabled, commercial partners can bring their associates for tours)

template.title: Sample Provision:
template.explain: (Processors with factories but no main products)

sche.title: Scheduling
sche.explain: (Allows advance production scheduling with commitments, helping processors manage resources while offering discounts)

debt.title: Credit Support
debt.explain: (Allows deferred payments through commitments, helping customer cash flow but carries risk..)

failover.title: Backup Supplier
failover.explain: (When selected, you'll serve as backup supplier, receiving priority orders when customers need additional goods)

storage.title: Warehousing Support
storage.explain: (Allows partners to use your warehouses, reducing shipping costs and increasing sales opportunities)

merge.title: Order Consolidation
merge.explain: (Combines different orders from multiple customers for bulk production, saving costs)

prom.title: Promotions
prom.explain:
(Basic promotions you can offer)

Note:

üî∏ These are basic promotions. For specific campaigns, please set highlights in marketing campaigns.

number.title: Quantity
number.explain: (Applies promotions when customers purchase certain quantities)

time.title: Seasonal
time.explain: (Applies promotions during specific periods like holidays)

mes.A0002: This section will help you update general information about your quotation, including name, address, start and end time of the quotation.
mes.A0003: - The start time must not be earlier than the current time; the default value is the current time.
mes.A0004: - The end time must not be earlier than the start time.
mes.B0007: Please enter all necessary product details. Providing complete and detailed information is an opportunity for you to connect with the most suitable suppliers as quickly as possible.
mes.B0008: Additionally, you can also select from your product history below for items that require requoting.
mes.B0009: should also be provided to help us and your customers easily find you.
mes.B0010: This is extremely useful for time optimization.
mes.B0011: If you want to request a quote from a specific supplier:
mes.B0012: You can select and enter the supplier code in the supplier selection section for each item below. However, we will limit the maximum number of suppliers to 3 per item.
mes.B0013: Supplier codes are retrieved and searched from
mes.B0015: Each quotation will include one PDF file, not exceeding 1MB in size.
mes.B0016: Each product will include one image, not exceeding 0.3MB in size.
mes.C0018: When you create a quotation, the system will automatically search and suggest the most suitable suppliers based on your requirements.
mes.C0019: However, you can further refine supplier selection using the criteria below.
mes.D0002: Below is the list of quotations you previously created, which are still pending or incomplete.
mes.D0003: You can select any of these quotations to view details.
mes.D0004: If you want to view all your quotations and STOP/RESTORE it, please go to the Quotation History section above.
mes.F0002: We will store your quotations for 30 days after they're completed and you can check the details here. If you need to keep them longer, you can <first>upgrade your account.</first>
